message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm asking for $200 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $120 for it. Looking forward to your response!

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest. While $120 is lower than I hoped for, I'm willing to come down to $175. That's still a fair price for this valuable product, and it gives us both a good deal. Let me know if you're interested.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'd like to propose $150 as my maximum offer for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
